trans-unit.source: Represents a button that enables the user to switch between the different <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> modes within the property grid .
trans-unit.target: Représente un bouton qui permet à l'utilisateur de passer d'un mode <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> à l'autre dans la grille des propriétés.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crée une instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines what type of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode" /> to display upon receipt of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Détermine le type de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode" /> à afficher à la réception d'un événement <see cref="T:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty" /> has changed (or gained or lost) its owning <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> and if that is <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, sets up the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> to be the mode to switch to.
trans-unit.target: Vérifie si le <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty" /> a modifié (ou acquis, ou encore perdu) son <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> propriétaire et s'il s'agit de <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, configure la <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> comme étant le mode auquel passer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that, when <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, means that the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> will be calculated automatically to match the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> of the owning <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une valeur qui, lorsque <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, signifie que la <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> sera calculée automatiquement pour correspondre à la <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> du <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> propriétaire.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Sinon, le mode auquel vous passerez sera basé sur la propriété <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> will switch automatically to the edit mode of its <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> passe automatiquement au mode d'édition de son <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> ; sinon <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property which, when <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, means that the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> will be calculated automatically to match the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> of the owning <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Inscrit la propriété de dépendance qui, lorsque <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, signifie que la <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> sera calculée automatiquement pour correspondre à la <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> du <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> propriétaire.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Sinon, le mode auquel vous passerez sera basé sur la propriété <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" />.

trans-unit.source: The edit mode to switch to when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Mode d'édition auquel passer lorsque vous cliquez sur <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property that gets or sets the targeted mode when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Inscrit la propriété de dépendance qui obtient ou définit le mode ciblé lorsque vous cliquez sur <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" />.
